thread.title: Listen: What Would Metallica's 'Spit Out The Bone' Sound Like If Slayer Recorded It [News]
thread.title_full: Listen: What Would Metallica's 'Spit Out The Bone' Sound Like If Slayer Recorded It [News]

title: Listen: What Would Metallica's 'Spit Out The Bone' Sound Like If Slayer Recorded It [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 4 hours ago 15 
Today from YouTube, the fella behind the alias of Creblestar shared his take on what Metallica's " Spit Out the Bone " would sound like if it was a Slayer tune. 
The dude noted: "Another Metallica cover but this time, it's been fully SLAYERED! AND WITH VOCALS!! Anyway I just did this for fun so don't take these covers too seriously! Guitars, Bass and Vocals are all performed by me. Drums are programmed 
"PS : Can u guess all the Slayer easter eggs?" 
The goods await in the embedded player below.
